name: Safar Tour &Travel Website
desc: Safar: A travel website project utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features responsive design, dynamic content, and interactive elements. Seamlessly navigate destinations, view attractions, and plan your next adventure with ease.

name: Rising Star Sports Website
